name: Soul Dream: Reality Shift
description:
CONTROLS
- Right Click to move around
- Abilities are labelled with their respective hotkeys
- You can always change your controls in the Settings Menu (arrow at the bottom of the screen)

Soul Dream: Reality Shift is a 30-60min demo where you play as two teens who have mistakenly shifted into the wrong reality. Fight your way through the Undesired Reality, unlocking mantras, abilities and classes!

For the completionists out there, Soul Dream: Reality Shift features:
- 3 Boss Encounters
- 5 Class Mantras
- 6 Ability Mantras
- 12 Stat Mantras
- 1 Wildcard Mantra (obtained by defeating the final boss of the demo)

Happy to hear feedback!

If you're interested in the progress of Soul Dream, follow my twitter, and click this steam link

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1760270
